name: Two Jumpers
description:
submission for ryan-laley-games-spring-jam

Two connected jumpers are trapped in the windy mountain. 

Try to survive from the windy mountain as long as you can!

The longer you survive, the more winds you can withstand, you will get the higher score.

HOW TO PLAY

Left Arrow key (or ◀ Button) to jump blue guy.

Right Arrow key (or ▶ Button) to jump pink guy.

bgm from:

https://opengameart.org/content/generic-8-bit-jrpg-soundtrack

tiles and backgrounds from:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer

characters & winds & UI assets by myself.
